REWARD_TOKEN().details: for backward compatibility with previous implementation of the Incentives controller

claimRewards(address[],uint256,address).details: Claims reward for an user, on all the assets of the lending pool, accumulating the pending rewards

params.to: Address that will be receiving the rewards

claimRewardsOnBehalf(address[],uint256,a.details: Claims reward for an user on behalf, on all the assets of the lending pool, accumulating the pending rewards. The caller must be whitelisted via "allowClaimOnBehalf" function by the RewardsAdmin role manager

params.to: Address that will be receiving the rewards
params.user: Address to check and claim rewards

configureAssets(address[],uint256[]).details: Configure assets for a certain rewards emission

getClaimer(address).details: Returns the whitelisted claimer for a certain address (0x0 if not set)

getRewardsBalance(address[],address).details: Returns the total of rewards of an user, already accrued + not yet accrued

getUserUnclaimedRewards(address).details: returns the unclaimed rewards of the user

handleAction(address,uint256,uint256).details: Called by the corresponding asset on any update that affects the rewards distribution

params.totalSupply: The total supply of the asset in the lending pool
params.userBalance: The balance of the user of the asset in the lending pool

setClaimer(address,address).details: Whitelists an address to claim the rewards on behalf of another address
